name: openapi-mcp-proxy
description: MCP Server for OpenAPI Schema Exploration - explore large OpenAPI schemas efficiently without loading entire schemas into LLM context
author: OpenAPI MCP Proxy Contributors

server.name: openapi-mcp-proxy
server.description: Explore OpenAPI schemas efficiently with pagination and smart caching

tools.name: add_api
tools.description: Add a new API configuration with name, URL and optional authentication headers

tools.name: get_api_info
tools.description: Get general information about an API

tools.name: list_endpoints
tools.description: List all endpoints in an API with pagination and filtering

tools.name: search_endpoints
tools.description: Search endpoints by query with pagination and filtering

tools.name: get_endpoint_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific endpoint

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List all data models in an API with pagination and filtering

tools.name: get_model_schema
tools.description: Get detailed schema for a specific model

usage_example.description: After installation, add APIs and explore their schemas efficiently
first_steps: Use add_api to register an OpenAPI schema URL
Use list_endpoints to explore available endpoints with pagination
Use search_endpoints to find specific functionality
Use get_endpoint_details for comprehensive endpoint information
